components.label: Email
components.description: Your certificate may be e-mailed to you from padi-professional@hubinternational.com. Please make sure you add this to your safe senders list.

components.label: Attachments
Content
components.content: The insurance costs include a premium, a $11 EFR administration fee, plus applicable taxes and fees.

components.tooltip: Premium fully earned means there is no refund if you cancel your insurance.
components.label: Field Set
AdditionalInsureds
components.content:
1. No charge for Additional Insureds, however, all must be listed.
  2. Entities other than those mentioned, when listed, will be reviewed by the insurance carrier; inclusion on your Certificate of Insurance will indicate that coverage is in effect.
  3. List business relationship versus personal relationship; eg., "Bob Smith, property owner" not "Bob Smith, father".
  4. Other Instructors and assistants may not be Additional Insureds but must obtain their own insurance.

components.label: Please choose one of these options
